text: Violeta Tomić, sometimes known in Slovenian as Violeta Tomič (born 22 January 1963) is a Slovenian television presenter and actress, serving as a deputy in the National Assembly. A member of The Left party, she was chosen as the lead candidate of the European United Left–Nordic Green Left group ahead of the 2019 European Parliament election but was not elected. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian politicians Category:Slovenian actresses Category:People from Sarajevo Category:Slovenian people of Bosnia and Herzegovina descent
title: Violeta Tomić
